actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish in the State of New Jersey the Treasure Island National Historical Site.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire by donation or purchase specified lands within Huntington County, New Jersey, known as Treasure Island, for the establishment of the Treasure Island National Historical Site.

titles.title: A bill to establish in the State of New Jersey the Treasure Island National Historical Site.
